long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
it's a github notifier with notifications, open pull request and comments for quick overview

User instructions
- obtain your github personal access token from github with repo auth checked. (https://help.github.com/en/github/authenticating-to-github/creating-a-personal-access-token-for-the-command-line)
- copy/paste your token into options and save
- You are ready to go!!

Repository Search Input
- It should be the same string [organization/repo] in your Github repository headline

1.2 What's in the new Version
- Changes to Pr *work on* button colors to bright orange
- Added a quick link to create new pr

1.3 Newest Bugfix
- Switching between repos now show error if the repo does not exist
